output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes (CMF: 11240002) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidates: Yes, mentions Simion and Ciolacu directly 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid post with 40,000-45,000 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, clear electoral messaging: - "Pe 1 decembrie, viitorul României depinde de votul tău" - Direct call to vote against specific candidates/parties (PSD, AUR) - Promotes PNL as "singurul partid" 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign messaging 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication
The post violates Article 55 t) because: - It contains explicit electoral messaging - Has a CMF number - Makes direct references to presidential candidates - Contains clear calls to vote - Promotes one party while attacking others - Targets the presidential elections specifically

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Makes direct electoral appeals - Names specific candidates - Contains explicit voting instructions - Uses campaign messaging - Has significant paid reach
conclusion.message-for-police: PNL Tecuci, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea si promovarea unei reclame pe Facebook (ID: 972415984698063) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, continand propaganda electorala explicita pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea include un numar CMF (11240002), face referiri directe la candidati prezidentiali (Ciolacu si Simion), contine indemnuri directe la vot ("Pe 1 decembrie, viitorul României depinde de votul tău"), si ataca explicit alti candidati prezidentiali in incercarea de a influenta votul ("PSD, alături de AUR, își arată adevăratele intenții"). Postarea a avut un impact semnificativ, atingand intre 40.000 si 45.000 de afisari, demonstrand intentia clara de a influenta votul in perioada in care campania electorala era inchisa.
